As ordered reported by the House Committee on Foreign Affairs on
July 29, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 4589, Diversity and Inclusion at the Department of State Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 128 (Wednesday, July 21, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. CASTRO of Texas:
H.R. 4589.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8 of the U.S. Constitution
[Page H3803]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported in the Nature of a Substitute (Amended) by Voice Vote.

title: Diversity and Inclusion at the Department of State Act
